attributes.action: amend the rules on affordable housing to include Coastguard Officers as Key Workers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
HM Coastguard officers coordinate many thousands of maritime and coastal incidents saving lives and protecting the nations maritime environment, and yet they do not receive the recognition that they are, in fact, key to the nations well being in the same way as other emergency services.

I urge you to reconsider this as HMCG officers are on even lower incomes than the police ambulance and fire services and finding affordable accomodation especially in this current climate is becoming even more difficult.
